column2: "Na Jehosafat kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no kaa n’egyanom ho wɔ David kurow mu: na ne babanyin Jehoram dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Na onyaa enuanom Jehosafat mbabanyin
column8: na Sefatia: woyinom nyinara Israelhen Jehosafat ne mba a."

column2: "Na hɔn egya maa hɔn akyɛdze kɛsenara
column6: ɔnye Juda mu nkurow a wɔabobɔ ho ban: na ahendzi no dze
column7: ɔdze maa Jehoram osiandɛ ɔno nye abakan."

column2: "Afei aber a Jehoram n’ahendzi tsimii wɔ ne nsamu no
column3: nna ɔdze afona kunkum no nuanom no nyinara
column4: na Israel mbapɔmba no mu binom so."

column2: "Aber a Jehoram hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduasa ebien; na odzii hen mfe awɔtwe wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na ɔnantseew Israel ahemfo kwan do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Ahab fi yɛe no: osiandɛ onyaa Ahab ne babaa waar no: na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE ammpɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ David fi no
column3: osian ahyɛmu a ɔnye David edzi no ntsi
column4: na dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ anohoba dɛ ɔbɛma ahendzi no etsim wɔ ɔno na ne mba nsamu dabaa no."

column2: "Ne nda mu na Edom tseew etua fii Juda nsaadze
column3: na wɔkɛhyɛɛ hɔnara hɔn do hen."

column2: "Nna Jehoram nye n’asafohemfo
column3: na ne ntseaseanam nyinara ka no ho twaa mu kɔree: na ɔsoɛɛr anadwe
column4: na okunkum Edomfo a woetwa no ho ehyia

column2: "Nna Edom tseew etua fii Juda ne nsaadze
column3: dze bodu ndɛ da yi: nna Libna so tseew etua mber no ara mu fii ne nsaadze: osiandɛ wɔapow EWURADZE

column2: "Nkyii so osisii mbea sorɔnsorɔm wɔ Juda mbepɔw no do
column3: na ɔyɛɛ ma hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm no enndzi nokwar amma Nyankopɔn

column2: "Na krataa bi fi nkɔnhyɛnyi Elija hɔ baa ne nkyɛn
column5: w’egya David ne Nyankopɔn se nye yi
column6: Osiandɛ ɔwo annantsew w’egya Jehosafat akwan do

column2: "na mbom anantsew Israel ahemfo akwan do
column3: na ayɛ Juda na Jerusalɛm atsefo ma wɔafom
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Ahab fi yɛe no; na eso ekuku wo nuanom a wofi w’egya fie a woye sen ɔwoara no ntsi:"

column2: "hwɛ
column3: EWURADZE dze owuyar kɛse bɔbɔ wo man

column2: "na ɔwoara so ibenya yafun mu yarbason
column3: ma ekodu dɛ osian yarba no ntsi w’ayamudze botu egu daa nyina."

column2: "Na EWURADZE nunuu Filistiafo
column3: na Arabiafo a wɔwɔ Etiopiafo nkyɛn no hɔn sunsum tsiaa Jehoram:"

column2: "na wɔfowee baa Juda do
column4: na wɔsosoo ahodze a wohun no wɔ ɔhen no ne fie no nyinara
column6: na ne yernom kɔree; ma dɛm ntsi ɔannka ɔbabanyin biara amma no
column8: ne mbabanyin mu ekumaba no nko."

column2: "Na iyi nyinara ekyir no EWURADZE dze yarba a onnyi edur bɔɔ no wɔ n’ayamudze mu."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column5: nna osian ne yarba no ntsi n’ayamudze tui gui
column6: na owuu yarba bɔn mu. Na ne man annhyew ɔhyew bi amma no a ɔtse dɛ n’egyanom ɔhyew no."

column2: "Aber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduasa ebien
column3: na odzii hen mfe awɔtwe wɔ Jerusalɛm: na owui a annyɛ obiara mpo asɛm; na wosiee no wɔ David kurow mu
column4: naaso nnyɛ ahemfo no hɔn asamandan no mu bi a."
